name: An Other Golf Game
summary: Experience golf as it should be with An Other Golf Game, offering a seamless, rudimentary but true-to-form golf experience. Navigate the course on foot or by cart, search for your ball after each shot, prepare for the next swing, considering every detail from club selection to judging the distance to the hole. Spend time finding your ball in the tall grass, tend to the pin, keep extra balls in your bag, and record your scores on a scorecard. Gauge the wind and its impact on your shot, and practice at the driving range.
